Container.Name: dockerdiscordcontrol
Container.Overview: DockerDiscordControl (DDC) v2.0 - Control your Docker containers directly from Discord! Features include real-time monitoring, multi-language support (German/French/English), Mech Evolution donation system, scheduled tasks, heartbeat monitoring, and comprehensive web UI. Built with Alpine Linux for enhanced security and 94% fewer vulnerabilities. Perfect for Unraid servers and Discord communities!
Container.Changes:
###v2.0.0 (2025-11-18) **MAJOR UPDATE - Complete Rewrite** - NEW: Multi-language support (German, French, English) - Full Discord UI translation - NEW: Mech Evolution system with 11 stages and animated WebP graphics - NEW: Continuous power decay system (minutengenau) for fair donation tracking - NEW: Premium key system for power users - IMPROVED: Docker performance optimization (16x faster cache, 7x faster processing) - IMPROVED: Advanced spam protection with configurable cooldowns - IMPROVED: Modern UI/UX overhaul with beautiful Discord embeds - IMPROVED: Alpine Linux base (94% fewer vulnerabilities, <200MB RAM) - FIXED: Port mapping consistency (9374) for Unraid deployment - FIXED: Interaction timeout issues with defer() pattern - FIXED: Translation coverage 100% across all languages
###v1.x (Previous) - Initial release with basic container control - Task scheduling and heartbeat monitoring - Web UI configuration panel
